params._avatar: the avatar to mint reputation from
params._lockingEndTime: the locking end time.       locking is disable after this time.
params._redeemEnableTime: redeem enable time .       redeem reputation can be done after this time.
params._reputationReward: the total reputation this contract will reward       for eth locking
